specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get the Furious and Regeneration special rules.
specialRules.name: Banner
specialRules.label: Banner
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get the Furious and Regeneration special rules.

specialRules.hint: Whenever a friendly hero within 6” would take a wound, you may assign that wound to this hero instead.
specialRules.name: Bodyguard
specialRules.label: Bodyguard
specialRules.description: Whenever a friendly hero within 6” would take a wound, you may assign that wound to this hero instead.

specialRules.hint: If this model is ever engaged in melee it is immediately killed and the enemy takes 3 hits. Additionally this model automatically passes all morale tests.
specialRules.name: Exploding Rats
specialRules.label: Exploding Rats
specialRules.description: If this model is ever engaged in melee it is immediately killed and the enemy takes 3 hits. Additionally this model automatically passes all morale tests.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get Fast.
specialRules.name: Megaphone
specialRules.label: Megaphone
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get Fast.

specialRules.hint: When the hero and his unit fight in melee roll one die and apply one bonus: • 1-2: Unit gets AP(+1) • 3-4: Unit gets +1 attack • 5-6: Enemies get -1 to hit Repair: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.
specialRules.name: Mutagens
specialRules.label: Mutagens
specialRules.description: When the hero and his unit fight in melee roll one die and apply one bonus: • 1-2: Unit gets AP(+1) • 3-4: Unit gets +1 attack • 5-6: Enemies get -1 to hit Repair: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”, which may immediately move by up to 6”.
specialRules.name: Tac-Console
specialRules.label: Tac-Console
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”, which may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Filth
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Poison in melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Cracks
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Sickness
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 18” gets -1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Lightning
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Frenzy
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Pestilence
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 automatic hit per model.
